alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 12:42AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of southwestern Stillwater and central Sweet Grass Counties through 115 AM MDT... At 1239 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms developing over the area, with the strongest storms 17 miles west of Absarokee, or 26 miles south of Big Timber, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, pea size hail and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Torrential rainfall which may lead to localized flooding and ponding of water. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dean and Nye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
